name: LinesIsLines, a classic puzzle
description:
Build 5 in a row, diagonals work.

It had many names: "Color lines", "Lines98", "Lines95", etc.

I really enjoyed it as a kid, so remade it to look nice in 2022, primarily targeting Android devices. Web version is also suited for mobile.

It's free with 0 ads.  If you want to thank me - challenge a friend to beat your result!

Rules

Build a line of at least 5 balls. Diagonals work. Every turn 3 balls appear if you did not burn a line this turn.

5 balls - 5 points, each ball after 5 is more valuable by one, 6th - 2 points, 7th - 3 points, etc.

The little balls show where the next 3 will appear.

Difficulty levels:
  • Easy - 6 colors
  • Normal - 7 colors
  • Hard - 9 colors and no undo.
My best on hard is 668, beat that! Advanced features

If you close the game, it resumes  next time you turn it on.

The random state is consistent: undo does not change the next balls.

Good luck!
